text: Research that led Sage Therapeutics to gain FDA approval yesterday of the first drug to treat postpartum depression started at NIH in the 1980s
author: annaedney

text: Also catch @JeffAGreen's great profile of the man who will be the first openly gay CEO of a large industrial company
author: annaedney

text: This week @BW publishes its equality issue. Make sure to read @josheidelson's fantastic piece on what could be a big Supreme Court battle for trans employees
author: annaedney

text: And icymi, here's my full interview with @SGottliebFDA today @BrookingsInst where he talks a lot about tobacco and says his last day at FDA will be April 5, after which he's taking his daughters to ... Disney World https://www.c-span.org/video/?458890-1/outgoing-fda-commissioner-scott-gottlieb-speaks-brookings-institution …
author: annaedney

text: FDA Commissioner @SGottliebFDA said he had a "difficult" meeting with Altria and Juul last week. Altria shares fell 2.2 percent, the biggest drop since January
author: annaedney

text: Haha thank you @megtirrell. I knew I'd have to compete with the socks!

text: Cool story from @matthewherper. Sometimes major medical breakthroughs take time

text: I'll be interviewing outgoing FDA Commissioner @SGottliebFDA tomorrow @BrookingsInst after he gives a talk on his tenure at the agency. You can catch it in person or watch here starting at 2:30p
